title: Corporate Auditorium
description: Experience our elegantly designed auditorium, featuring a soothing palette of green, yellow, and beige, which creates a sophisticated and inspiring ambiance ideal for corporate gatherings and events.

title: Waiting Lounge Flooring
description: Discover our creatively designed flooring in the waiting lounge, showcasing circular tiles with eye-catching contrasting inserts, blending modernity with artistic flair to enhance any commercial space.

title: Athangudi Style Balcony
description: Step out onto our vibrant Athangudi-style balcony, where the classic combination of blue and brown tiles offers a lively and inviting atmosphere, perfect for enjoying outdoor moments.

Admire the exquisitely personalized wall mural at 'Coast II Coast,' Bengaluru's esteemed seafood restaurant chain, which stands as the captivating centerpiece, enriching the gastronomic journey for every diner.
title: Seafood Cuisine Restaurant

description: Explore our stunningly designed convention hall, inspired by the opulent and intricate architectural elements of Morocco, creating a majestic and unforgettable venue for significant events and gatherings.
title: Convention Hall
